attributes.action: Reverse the decision to Self-ID as Trans without diagnosis of Gender Dysphoria
attributes.additional_details: It is to protect females, preventing males entering female spaces in a state of undress. Preventing sex offenders identifying as Trans entering female spaces.
attributes.background: Ban Self ID for trans people, Allow Photo ID with Gender Recognition Certificate for only Trans people who have had SRS/GRS.

rejection.details:
It is not possible to self-identify as transgender.

You could start a new petition asking to require surgery to obtain a GRC.
